Articles.Content: Per the KSPTV Twitch page, no Squadcast today ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Actually, I saw on the Twitter before that which said he wasn't feeling so good today.
Thanks for the update Horseman! I wonder what will be on next week!
Do you know if there there an after party for squad for today though? I see one scheduled for 9:30PM EDT.
